screen.config.title: Halo configuration
screen.config.subtitle: Change halo type
screen.config.angleOffsetTooltip: Adjust vertical angle offset. If you want the halo to be behind your head instead of above it, adjust this option appropriately.
screen.config.heightOffsetTooltip: Adjust height offset. This option allows you to adjust the distance of the halo from the top of your head.
screen.config.firstPersonVisibilityToolt: Toggle whether the halo can be seen in first person.
